default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: You caught me again! Fine then. I'll keep hitting the Corruptors' heads like baseballs. After all, they were the ones who made me like this.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Such strong power... if only I could control it.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I've become this strong already? If only I were as strong when I was back on the Eastside baseball fields.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Oh... is this area considered out?

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Easier than a bunt.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Despicable! A bunt...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Home run!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: What does it even matter... if I'm stronger?! Arghh!

default.title: Greeting
default.text: When will it be my turn to play?

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Prepare some extra baseball bats. The ones from the purchasing office aren't enough. They won't survive a single battle.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Hey, isn't this my fake Eastside identity from way back? Cough... back then, I had to get it to compete in a game.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: It's hard for me to control my emotions. If you find me in unusually high or low spirits, be sure to steer clear. Don't blame me for not warning you if you get beaten to a pulp.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Isn't the sound of batting a baseball music to the ears? Right? I fell in love with baseball the moment I heard that!

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Can I skip the mission in Eastside? It's not that I'm scared, I just don't like that place... Of course, if we can watch an Eastside Baseball League game afterwards, you can ignore what I just said.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: There's a Syndicate baseball game tomorrow, do you want to watch the live stream together? If you don't understand baseball, I can be your commentator.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: If possible, I really want to challenge the stronger teams... with you here, I think I can control my power. Hey, how about we try it sometime on the baseball field?

default.title: Idle
default.text: Ah... can you ask the purchasing office to bring me some posters for this baseball tournament? No, I don't play... but I can collect just the same!

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Hey! Didn't we agree to keep some distance?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Good eye! Just like a focused baseball champ.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Start running to the next base!

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Safe!

default.title: Level Up
default.text: ... I'm strong enough already.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Prepare to bat.
